overview:
Elizabeth is a founder/owner of Digital Luxury, a Latin American start-up since 2008.

Digital Luxury offers its expertise as a global Internet retailing partner for leading fashion & premium brands. Both within the Hipxik.com model of “private sales” and its â€œpowered byâ€ concepts, Digital Luxury is a market leader in Latin American ecommerce, offering 360 degree e-business solutions for its customers. Currently Digital Luxury operates in both Brazil and Mexico.

For over 15 years, Elizabeth has been involved in the development and launch of a handful of innovative companies in the e-commerce, retail and luxury lifestyle sectors. She joined US fashion specialty retailer bebe stores inc, at the companyâ€™s initial launch in the early 1990s and served as a Director of Stores.
